languages.text: Служитель Администратума отказывается принимать грамоту без последней печати, заверяющей сам документ и два предыдущих штампа. Вольному Торговцу предстоит выстоять очередь вместе с сотнями других просителей, как того требует закон Империума.

traits.locale_text: Служитель Администратума отказывается принимать грамоту без последней печати, заверяющей сам документ и два предыдущих штампа. Вольному Торговцу предстоит выстоять очередь вместе с сотнями других просителей, как того требует закон Империума.

languages.text: The Administratum clerk refuses to accept the document without the last seal certifying the document and two previous seals. As dictated by the laws of the Imperium, the Rogue Trader will have to stand in the queue with hundreds of other petitioners to obtain it.
languages.original_text: Служитель Администратума отказывается принимать грамоту без последней печати, заверяющей сам документ и два предыдущих штампа. Вольному Торговцу предстоит выстоять очередь вместе с сотнями других просителей, как того требует закон Империума.

traits.locale_text: The Administratum clerk refuses to accept the certificate without the last seal certifying the document and two previous seals. As dictated by the laws of Imperium, the Rogue Trader will have to stand in queue with hundreds of other applicants to get it.

The Administratum clerk refuses to accept the document without the last seal certifying the document and two previous seals. As dictated by the laws of the Imperium, the Rogue Trader will have to stand in the queue with hundreds of other petitioners to obtain it.

The Administratum clerk refuses to accept the document without the last seal certifying the document and two previous seals. As dictated by the laws of the Imperium, the Rogue Trader will have to stand in the queue with hundreds of other petitioners to obtain it.

languages.text: Le greffier de l'Administratum refuse d'accepter le document sans le dernier sceau de certification et les deux sceaux précédents. Conformément aux lois de l'Imperium, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} doit faire la queue avec des centaines d'autres requérants pour l'obtenir.
languages.original_text: The Administratum clerk refuses to accept the document without the last seal certifying the document and two previous seals. As dictated by the laws of the Imperium, the Rogue Trader will have to stand in the queue with hundreds of other petitioners to obtain it.

traits.locale_text: Le greffier de l'Administratum refuse d'accepter le document sans le dernier sceau de certification et les deux sceaux précédents. Conformément aux lois de l'Imperium, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} doit faire la queue avec des centaines d'autres requérants pour l'obtenir.

languages.text: 文件上需要加盖两个印章，之后还需要加盖最终印章才可以。根据帝国法律规定，行商浪人需要与其他几百名请愿者一起排队，才能办好相关手续。
languages.original_text: The Administratum clerk refuses to accept the document without the last seal certifying the document and two previous seals. As dictated by the laws of the Imperium, the Rogue Trader will have to stand in the queue with hundreds of other petitioners to obtain it.

traits.locale_text: 文件上需要加盖两个印章，之后还需要加盖最终印章才可以。根据帝国法律规定，行商浪人需要与其他几百名请愿者一起排队，才能办好相关手续。

languages.text: 行政局の役人は、文書を証明する最後の印章と、その前の2つの印章がなければ文書を受理してくれない。帝国の法律で定められているように、自由開拓者はそれを手に入れるため、何百人もの嘆願者に混じって列に並ばなければならない。
languages.original_text: The Administratum clerk refuses to accept the document without the last seal certifying the document and two previous seals. As dictated by the laws of the Imperium, the Rogue Trader will have to stand in the queue with hundreds of other petitioners to obtain it.

traits.locale_text: 行政局の役人は、文書を証明する最後の印章と、その前の2つの印章がなければ文書を受理してくれない。帝国の法律で定められているように、自由開拓者はそれを手に入れるため、何百人もの嘆願者に混じって列に並ばなければならない。

languages.text: Der Beamte des Administratums weigert sich, das Dokument ohne das letzte Siegel zu akzeptieren, welches das Dokument und die zwei früheren Siegel beglaubigt. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} muss sich mit hunderten von anderen Antragstellern anstellen, so verlangt es das Gesetz des Imperiums.
languages.original_text: The Administratum clerk refuses to accept the document without the last seal certifying the document and two previous seals. As dictated by the laws of the Imperium, the Rogue Trader will have to stand in the queue with hundreds of other petitioners to obtain it.

traits.locale_text: Der Beamte des Administratums weigert sich, das Dokument ohne das letzte Siegel zu akzeptieren, welches das Dokument und die zwei früheren Siegel beglaubigt. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} muss sich mit hunderten von anderen Antragstellern anstellen, so verlangt es das Gesetz des Imperiums.

languages.text: El funcionario del Administratum se niega a aceptar el documento sin el último sello, que certifica el documento y los dos sellos anteriores. Como dictan las leyes del Imperium, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente tendrá que hacer cola con cientos de otros solicitantes para obtenerlo.
languages.original_text: The Administratum clerk refuses to accept the document without the last seal certifying the document and two previous seals. As dictated by the laws of the Imperium, the Rogue Trader will have to stand in the queue with hundreds of other petitioners to obtain it.

traits.locale_text: El funcionario del Administratum se niega a aceptar el documento sin el último sello, que certifica el documento y los dos sellos anteriores. Como dictan las leyes del Imperium, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente tendrá que hacer cola con cientos de otros solicitantes para obtenerlo.

languages.text: Administratum kâtibi, belgeyi tasdikleyen son mühür ve önceki iki mühür olmadan dosyayı kabul etmeyi reddediyor. İmparatorluk yasalarında emredildiği üzere Hür Tacir, yüzlerce müracaatçıyla birlikte mührü almak için sırada beklemeli.
languages.original_text: The Administratum clerk refuses to accept the document without the last seal certifying the document and two previous seals. As dictated by the laws of the Imperium, the Rogue Trader will have to stand in the queue with hundreds of other petitioners to obtain it.
